It seems the command to save the private key and set permissions was concatenated wrongly causing issues.

I will save the key to /root/id_rsa_user_key.pem correctly now, then set permissions:

echo '-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
<key content>
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----' > /root/id_rsa_user_key.pem

chmod 600 /root/id_rsa_user_key.pem

I will run these two as separate commands to avoid concatenation issues.
